title: Can't assign Head of Family
body:
In this article, we will show you the reason why you can't assign a Head of Family.
One of the reasons why you can't assign a head of a family to a child is because the child has been set as head of the family. 
If a patient has been assigned as a head of family, MediRecords will not permit the user to add another head of family.

Follow these steps for you to assign a head of family.
From Patient Record select the Details tab
Make sure that you're in Demographic section
Click Family
Tick the box beside the name of the family member
Click the hyphen sign to delete the member of the family
Click OK and make sure to Click Save.
NOTE: When a patient's family member is deleted from their patient record, their relationship is also deleted from other patient records where they were previously listed.
After that, you can assign a Head of Family to a child or other member of the family.       
    Click the link on How to Make a Family Member as a Head of Family.
